Main Contribution: Deep learning-based SQLi testing tool for generating semantically sophisticated test cases.
Evaluates model-based testing of Java applications, demonstrating its ability to automatically generate large numbers of test cases.
Systematic literature review on testing adaptive and context-aware systems, characterizing approaches, challenges, and trends.
Survey of test case generation, selection, and prioritization approaches for cyber-physical systems.
Introduces the first few-shot learning approach using CodeBERT and Siamese networks to classify flaky tests.
Evaluating DRL-MOBTEST's performance in generating test cases for Android apps.
Investigation of how model-based test coverage translates to code coverage, identifying limitations in MBT approaches.
Model-driven engineering approach to automate the construction of metamorphic testing environments for specific domains.
Proposes a learning-based approach that uses property-specific vectors to control code generation security.
Introducing LIBRO, an LLM-based framework that automatically generates bug-reproducing tests from general bug reports.
Proposes a GPT-based approach for automated API test generation.
Compares four mutation testing tools (ÂµBERT, IBIR, DeepMutation, PIT) in fault detection and cost-effectiveness.
Systematic literature review on test case prioritization techniques, focusing on model-based and object-oriented testing.
Creation of a large collection of AI generated C programs with vulnerability classification using formal verification.
Presenting TestGen-LLM, Meta's automated test improvement tool that uses LLMs to enhance human-written tests.
Introduces ChatUniTest an LLM-based unit test generation framework with adaptive context and validation-repair mechanisms.
Proposing a cost-effective UI automation testing approach combining LLMs with retrieval-augmented generation and machine learning.
Introducing UniTSyn, a large-scale multilingual dataset of 2.7 million focal-test pairs that enhances LLMs' unit test generation.
Demonstrating the effectiveness of fine-tuned smaller LLMs for mobile app test generation.
Proposing an LLM-based approach to automatically generate test cases for genetic programming agents.
Conduct the first systematic comparison between LLMs and constraint-based tools for directed test input generation.
Demonstrating that AI models can reduce test script development time for web end-to-end testing.
Proposal of Mutation-based Consistency Testing to assess LLMs' code understanding focusing on subtle inconsistencies.
Proposes an LLM-based mobile GUI testing framework that formulates testing as a Q\&A task.
Developing a domain-adapted LLM for VLSI design that outperforms general models on chip design tasks.
Demonstrate through user studies that preemptive prompting in LLM-assisted test case development improves branch coverage.
Verification of relational completeness in SQL codes generated by ChatGPT.
Proposes a method that improves LLM-based unit test generation for complex Java methods by decomposing them into slices.
Provides a comprehensive survey of studies on LLM applications in software testing.
Demonstrating that diverse LLMs outperform ChatGPT in Software Quality Assurance tasks.
Proposes an LLM-based approach that automatically deduces reusable input transformations from hard-coded test cases.
Proposes LLM4Fin, a fully automated approach combining LLMs and algorithmic methods to generate high-coverage FinTech test cases.
Introduces the first test-free fault localization approach using bidirectional adapter layers on LLMs.
Conducting the first comprehensive empirical evaluation of open-source LLMs for unit test generation.
Proposes a ChatTester, a ChatGPT-based approach with iterative refinement that improves unit test generation.
